subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams was fined $10,000 on Sunday for her tirade against a line judge at the conclusion of her semifinals loss. Friends and allies hope she will apologize on Monday.
snippet: Serena Williams was fined $10,000 on Sunday for her tirade against a line judge at the conclusion of her semifinals loss. Friends and allies hope she will apologize on Monday.
